title: S16 Ep3: Holzer's Ghosts: Phantoms of the Fire - The Haunting of Rye, NY
itunes:title: Holzer's Ghosts: Phantoms of the Fire - The Haunting of Rye, NY
description:
Darkness Radio Presents Holzer's Ghosts: Phantoms of the Fire - The Haunting of Rye, NY

Dave & guest Cindy Kaza look back at The Holzer Files, Season 1 Episode 1 Phantoms of the Fire - The Haunting of Rye, NY.

The team reopens legendary ghost hunter Hans Holzer's 50-year-old case of rampant paranormal activity at one of the oldest houses in Rye, New York. They aim to find out if the terrifying and tortured souls have finally moved on -- or simply moved.

Check out Discovery+ for Holzer Files Season 1 and more great programming: https://bit.ly/3nloxy5
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
